overview_of_class: MATH 460-1 Fundamental group and covering spaces, MATH 460-2 Simplical, singular, and cellular (co-) homology; universal coefficient and Kuenneth theorems, MATH 460-3 Cohomology rings and Poincare duality; Thom Isomorphism and characteristic classes. Prerequisites: For MATH 460-2: MATH 460-1; For MATH 460-3: MATH 460-2.
name: Algebraic Topology
title: WCAS MATH 460-2-61 Algebraic Topology
